event.description: Chone Figgins grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Maicer Izturis grounds out to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Bobby Abreu singles on a ground ball to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Torii Hunter grounds out, pitcher Brett Anderson to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Mike Napoli doubles (4) on a line drive to right fielder Travis Buck.
Howie Kendrick grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Kendrys Morales flies out to right fielder Travis Buck. Mike Napoli to 3rd.
Juan Rivera flies out to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Jeff Mathis grounds out, pitcher Brett Anderson to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Chone Figgins singles on a bunt ground ball to second baseman Gregorio Petit.
With Maicer Izturis batting, Chone Figgins steals (10) 2nd base.
Maicer Izturis walks.
Bobby Abreu singles on a ground ball to third baseman Bobby Crosby. Chone Figgins to 3rd. Maicer Izturis to 2nd.
Torii Hunter singles on a line drive to center fielder Rajai Davis. Chone Figgins scores. Maicer Izturis scores. Bobby Abreu to 3rd.
Mike Napoli singles on a line drive to right fielder Travis Buck. Bobby Abreu scores. Torii Hunter to 3rd.
Howie Kendrick grounds into a double play, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to second baseman Gregorio Petit to first baseman Jason Giambi. Mike Napoli out at 2nd.
Kendrys Morales grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Juan Rivera grounds out, third baseman Bobby Crosby to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Jeff Mathis grounds out, second baseman Gregorio Petit to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Chone Figgins singles on a line drive to right fielder Travis Buck.
Maicer Izturis out on a sacrifice bunt, pitcher Brett Anderson to first baseman Jason Giambi. Chone Figgins to 2nd.
Bobby Abreu lines out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Torii Hunter singles on a ground ball to left fielder Matt Holliday. Chone Figgins scores.
Mike Napoli doubles (5) on a fly ball to center fielder Rajai Davis. Torii Hunter scores.
Pitching Change: Sean Gallagher replaces Brett Anderson.
Howie Kendrick strikes out on a foul tip.
Kendrys Morales grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Juan Rivera grounds out, second baseman Gregorio Petit to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Jeff Mathis strikes out swinging.

Maicer Izturis grounds out to first baseman Jason Giambi. Chone Figgins to 2nd.
Bobby Abreu flies out to center fielder Rajai Davis. Chone Figgins to 3rd.
Torii Hunter flies out to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Mike Napoli singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Bobby Crosby.
With Howie Kendrick batting, Mike Napoli caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Kurt Suzuki to second baseman Gregorio Petit.
Howie Kendrick grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Kendrys Morales doubles (8) on a line drive to right fielder Travis Buck.
Juan Rivera flies out to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Jeff Mathis strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Jerry Blevins replaces Sean Gallagher.
Chone Figgins flies out to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Maicer Izturis flies out to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Kurt Suzuki grounds out, shortstop Maicer Izturis to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Orlando Cabrera singles on a ground ball to left fielder Juan Rivera, deflected by third baseman Chone Figgins.
Jason Giambi hit by pitch. Orlando Cabrera to 2nd.
Matt Holliday pops out to first baseman Kendrys Morales in foul territory.
Jack Cust strikes out swinging.
Bobby Crosby doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Juan Rivera.
Travis Buck strikes out swinging.
Gregorio Petit pops out to catcher Jeff Mathis in foul territory.
Rajai Davis grounds out, shortstop Maicer Izturis to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Kurt Suzuki grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Orlando Cabrera flies out softly to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Jason Giambi strikes out swinging.
Matt Holliday flies out to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Jack Cust strikes out swinging.
Bobby Crosby singles on a ground ball to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Travis Buck grounds into a force out, fielded by shortstop Maicer Izturis. Bobby Crosby out at 2nd.
Gregorio Petit grounds out, third baseman Chone Figgins to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Rajai Davis strikes out swinging.
Kurt Suzuki grounds out, third baseman Chone Figgins to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Orlando Cabrera singles on a line drive to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Jason Giambi singles on a ground ball to center fielder Torii Hunter. Orlando Cabrera to 3rd.
Matt Holliday pops out to first baseman Kendrys Morales in foul territory.
Jack Cust strikes out on a foul tip.
Bobby Crosby walks. Jason Giambi to 2nd.
With Travis Buck batting, Orlando Cabrera scores on a balk. Jason Giambi advances to 3rd on a balk. Bobby Crosby advances to 2nd on a balk.
Travis Buck flies out to right fielder Bobby Abreu.
Gregorio Petit flies out to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Rajai Davis strikes out on a foul tip.
Kurt Suzuki homers (2) on a fly ball to left field.
Pitching Change: Jose Arredondo replaces Joe Saunders.
